data.title: Water Outage at Ponderosa Campground
data.description: The Ponderosa Campground is experiencing a temporary water outage. Please bring all the water you’ll need for your visit, including drinking water.

data.title: Uber, Lyft, and Other "Taxi" Services
data.description: Bandelier is in a remote location, with cell service in the canyon limited to Verizon 4G only. Services like Uber and Lyft will bring you here, but there may be no way to contact a ride out. Please plan your pickup before being dropped off at Bandelier.

data.title: The Use of GPS is NOT Recommended
data.description: Numerous visitors have been routed to remote trailheads and out-of-the-way roads trying to use GPS to reach the main park area or shuttle stop.
